instance.message.authentication-code: Instance requires to authenticate Minecraft account. Authentication pending.
instance.message.signal-restart: Received a signal to restart this instance.
instance.message.signal-shutdown: Received a signal to shutdown this instance.
instance.message.no-autoconnect: Minecraft instance is set to not auto connect. A manual connect signal is needed to start.
instance.message.minecraft-kicked: Minecraft account has been kicked off the server.
instance.message.internet-problems: Failed to establish secure connection. Trying again in 30 seconds...
instance.message.failed-too-many-times: Client failed to connect too many times. No further trying to reconnect.
instance.message.version-incompatible: Minecraft account has been kicked off Hypixel due to incompatibility version. Maybe it needs an update.
instance.message.logged-from-another-loc: Someone logged in from another place.Won't try to re-login.
instance.message.xbox-down: Microsoft XBOX service is down. Will retry again soon.
instance.message.xbox-throttled: Microsoft XBOX service throttled due to too many requests. Will retry again soon.
instance.message.no-account: Does the account own minecraft? changing skin and reconnecting might help fix the problem.
instance.message.proxy-problem: Encountered a problem while working with Minecraft instance proxy.
instance.message.restarting: Minecraft instance will try to restart soon.
instance.message.guild-kicked: Minecraft account has been kicked off the guild.
discord.status.chat-failed: Chat with {{instanceName}} has been permanently interrupted. Manual intervention is required!
discord.status.chat-notice: Something happened with {{instanceName}} that may require intervention.
discord.message.no-permission: You do not have permission to do this.
discord.message.no-permission-roles:
$t(discord.message.no-permission)
You must have one of these roles: {{roles, list(style: short; type: disjunction)}}
discord.message.no-permission-admin:
$t(discord.message.no-permission)
You must be one of these admins: {{admins, list(style: short; type: disjunction)}}
discord.message.no-permission-roles-admi:
$t(discord.message.no-permission-roles)
Or, you must be one of these admins: {{admins, list(style: short; type: disjunction)}}
discord.commands.settings.header1: Options marked with $t(discord.commands.settings.essential) are essential. Change at your own risk.
discord.commands.settings.header2: Options marked with $t(discord.commands.settings.recommended) are recommended for quality of life.
discord.commands.settings.header3: Options marked with $t(discord.commands.settings.warning) should only be messed with if you know what you are doing.
discord.commands.settings.main.title: Main
discord.commands.settings.main.descripti:
Welcome to Application options!
You can choose one of the categories below to expand it.

$t(discord.commands.settings.header)
commands.explain: {{username}}, I am a robot that connects this chat to discord! I have many commands you can use, see them all with {{commandPrefix}}commands
commands.forge.none: {{username}} does not have anything in forge.
commands.67: Something happened to {{username}}. Want to know? Do {{command}}
commands.megawalls.response: {{username}}'s Megawalls: Games {{games, number}} - Wins {{wins, number}} - Kills {{kills, number}} - KDR {{kdr, number(minimumFractionDigits: 2; maximumFractionDigits: 2)}}.
commands.jacob.response: {{username}}'s Jacob: Platinum {{platinum, number}} - Diamond {{diamond, number}} - Gold {{gold, number}} - Farming Cap {{farmingCap, number}}/10 - Double Drops {{doubleDrops, number}}/15
commands.bedwars.response: {{username}}'s Bedwars: level {{level, number(maximumFractionDigits: 0)}}✫ - FKDR {{fkdr, number(minimumFractionDigits: 2; maximumFractionDigits: 2)}} - Final kills {{kills, number}}.
commands.skywars.response: {{username}}'s Skywars: Games played {{games, number(maximumFractionDigits: 0)}} - Kills {{kills, number}} - KDR {{kdr, number(minimumFractionDigits: 2; maximumFractionDigits: 2)}}.
commands.hotm.response: {{username}} is HOTM {{hotm, number}} with powders ({{mithril, number}} Mithril - {{gemstone, number}} Gemstone - {{glacite, number}} Glacite).
commands.math.response.easter: {{username}} haiyaaaaaaaaa this is so easy, you're a disappointment *takes off slipper* (answer: {{result, number}})
commands.skills.response: {{username}} Skills: AVG {{average, number(maximumFractionDigits: 1)}}, combat {{combat, number(maximumFractionDigits: 1)}}, farm {{farming, number(maximumFractionDigits: 1)}}, fish {{fishing, number(maximumFractionDigits: 1)}}, mine {{mining, number(maximumFractionDigits: 1)}}, forage {{foraging, number(maximumFractionDigits: 1)}}, enchant {{enchanting, number(maximumFractionDigits: 1)}}, alch {{alchemy, number(maximumFractionDigits: 1)}}, carp {{carpentry, number(maximumFractionDigits: 1)}}, rune {{runecrafting, number(maximumFractionDigits: 1)}}, tame {{taming, number(maximumFractionDigits: 1)}}, social {{social, number(maximumFractionDigits: 1)}}
commands.uhc.response: {{username}} is UHC level {{level}}✫ - Wins {{wins, number}} - Kills {{kills, number}} - KDR {{kdr, number(minimumFractionDigits: 2; maximumFractionDigits: 2)}}
commands.woolwars.response: {{username}}'s Woolwars: Games {{games, number}} - Wins {{wins, number}} - Kills {{kills, number}} - KDR {{kdr, number(minimumFractionDigits: 2; maximumFractionDigits: 2)}}.
commands.error.minecraft-render-not-supp: Rendering images is not supported on the host provider :(
Rendering images is not supported on this platform :(
commands.error.must-be-ingame: {{username}}, Can only use this command in-game!
commands.error.must-be-admin: {{username}}, You must be an admin to use this command!
commands.error.never-joined-hypixel: {{username}} has never played on Hypixel before?
commands.dojo.none: {{username}} has never played Skyblock Dojo before?
commands.garden.response: {{username}} Garden: Total Pests {{totalKilledPests, number}} - Unique Visitors {{uniqueVisitors, number}}
commands.age.response: {{username}} first logged into hypixel on {{firstLogin, datetime}} or about {{timeSinceFirstLogin}} ago.
commands.rank.response: {{username}} has been a {{rank}} for the last {{timeAsRank}}
commands.praise: {{name}} needs to chill before everyone online gets wet and hard
{{name}} is so hot they are single handedly raising the temperature in here by 10% :)
{{name}} is adorable and should know it :P
{{name}} makes me smile when they walk in the room :)
{{name}} is the reason robots have feelings ;)
someone should tell {{name}} they are adorable <3
The vibes are always great when {{name}} is around.
If cuteness was a skill, {{name}} would have hit level 60 in seconds!
commands.insult: {{name}} would manage to trip over wireless connection
{{name}}, if brains were taxed, you’d get a refund
{{name}} is like a puzzle with half its pieces
{{name}} plays like their controller’s unplugged
{{name}}, if laziness were an Olympic sport, you'd still find a way to come in second
{{name}} looks like they get dressed in the dark... with mittens on
{{name}} has a face for podcasts
{{name}} once got lost on a straight road
{{name}} thought Bluetooth was a dental condition
{{name}} tried to screenshot a piece of paper
{{name}} looks like they got kicked out of the dollar store for being too broke
{{name}} once googled how to open Google
{{name}} tried to scroll a screenshot and got mad when it didn’t move
{{name}} failed a personality quiz—twice
{{name}} got a paper cut from a pdf
{{name}} would lose a debate to a Magic 8 Ball
{{name}} got friend-zoned by a Magic 8 Ball
{{name}} studied for a blood test
{{name}}'s thought process has a dial-up tone
{{name}} has mastered the art of saying something without contributing at all
I admire how {{name}} just speaks their mind. Even when no one asked
{{name}}, You’re the reason God created the middle finger.
{{name}} is like a pop-up ad: loud, pointless, and hard to get rid of
{{name}}, You bring everyone so much joy… when you leave the room.
{{name}}, You're like a cloud. When you disappear, it's a beautiful day.
{{name}}, You're not stupid; you just have bad luck thinking.
{{name}}, You're proof that evolution can go in reverse.
{{name}}, Your secrets are always safe with me. I never even listen when you tell them.
{{name}}, You're like a software update… always popping up at the worst time and doing absolutely nothing useful.
{{name}}, You're the reason shampoo bottles have instructions.
{{name}}, You're as sharp as a marble.
{{name}}, You're like a WiFi signal—strong in the corner but gone when I actually need you.
{{name}}, You have something on your chin… no, the third one down.
{{name}}, You're like a mystery meat sandwich—nobody knows what you're made of, and we’re too afraid to ask.
{{name}}, You're not totally useless—you can always serve as a bad example.
{{name}}, You're like a software demo: limited, glitchy, and expires quickly.
{{name}}, You're the human version of a participation trophy.
{{name}}, If I had a dollar for every smart thing you said, I’d be broke.
{{name}}, You're like a Slinky. Not really good for anything, but you bring a smile when pushed down the stairs.
{{name}}, You're not annoying. You’re just... consistently disappointing.
{{name}}, You're the kind of person who trips over a wireless signal.
{{name}}, You're like a puzzle with half the pieces missing and none of the edge ones.
{{name}}, You're the reason they put directions on Pop-Tarts.
{{name}}, You're like a Netflix show with 9 seasons—should’ve ended after 2.
{{name}}, You bring so much confusion, you could be a math word problem.
{{name}}, You're the kind of person who claps when the plane lands.
{{name}}, Your brain is on airplane mode and forgot to reconnect.
{{name}}, You're like a speed bump—unnecessary and mildly irritating.
{{name}}, You're not the sharpest tool in the shed, but at least you're in there... somewhere.
{{name}}, You're like a WiFi signal in a bunker—just not reaching anyone.
{{name}}, You're like a phone at 1%—barely hanging on and causing panic.
{{name}}, You're the human equivalent of a typo.
{{name}}, You're like a Bluetooth speaker at a party—loud, annoying, and someone always tries to disconnect you.
{{name}}, You’d lose a battle of wits with a salad.
{{name}}, You're about as edgy as a marshmallow.
{{name}}, You have something special... it’s just well hidden. Like, really well.
